apps.name: Douane
apps.description: This place allows you to alter character status regarding Faction, Disposition, Threat level, Clearance, and several other things.
apps.iconAlt: Red Circle with dark green horizontal bar and tan checkmark

apps.name: Talon
apps.description: This app is for Plotball management, to create plot that does not perse require figurants.

apps.name: Medicorum
apps.description: Here you can hide people / corporations / other things listed in the database from medicorum.

apps.name: Beacon
apps.description: Here you can push buttons to make Beacon do things. Your personal access code is:
apps.iconAlt: A circle orbited by a smaller circle with the orbit line visible

apps.name:
Attack
Vector

apps.name:
Mission
Board
apps.description: You can plan missions here, and do other CIC stuff.

apps.name:
System
Central

apps.description: Here you will see a list of all players, and their face.
